findings.title: Contract Owner is able to stop or pause transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner by enabling the `swapInProgress` boolean or calling the `blacklistAddress` function.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the authority to transfer tokens from a specific address.

findings.title: Owner Transfer User's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner and can take advantage of it by enabling the `swapInProgress` boolean or calling the `blacklistAddress` function.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)
findings.description: The contract owner has limited authority to increase fees beyond 25%.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase the amount of liquidity taken by dev wallet more than a reasonable percent
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to control the amount of liquidity taken by the dev wallet, but it's limited to a reasonable percentage.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to mint new tokens
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to mint new tokens.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to burn tokens from specific wallet
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the capability to burn tokens from a specific wallet.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to blacklist wallets from selling
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the authority to blacklist wallets from selling.

findings.title: State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.
